text: Dionysius Exiguus (â€“), was a monk born in Scythia Minor. This is now a part of modern Romania. Dionysius is best known as the inventor of the Anno Domini era, which is used to number the years of both the Gregorian calendar and the Julian calendar. ==Related pages== * Anno Domini Category:470 births Category:544 deaths Category:Chronology Category:6th-century people Category:Christian monks
title: Dionysius Exiguus
